pages.text: To the left of Maid GUI is a list of available tasks of that maid. Here are explanations of them: $(li)Sitting (Idle?): The default task; maids will sit in-place and do nothing. $(li)Attack: requiring a sword (weapon?) being placed in maids' main hand; maids will seek and attack hositile mobs just as a tamed wolf.

$(li)Archer: requiring a bow being placed in maids' main hand and arrows in maids' inventory; maids will seek and attack hositile mobs using bow instead. $(li)Danmaku/Bullet Hell/Shooter: requring a Gohei being placed in maids' main hand; maids will seek and attack hositile mobs using the Gohei. The amount of bullets depends on the amount of mobs surrounding the maid. $(li)Farm(er): maids will plant seeds in their inventory onto farmlands nearby and seek matured crops to harvest them.

$(li)Sugarcane: plants and harvests sugarcanes.$(li)Melons: harvest watermelons and pumpkins.$(li)Cocoa: plant and harvest cocoas.$(li)Grass: clean weeds and flowers around them.$(li)Feed: maids will auto feed owner/master player using foods in their inventory if owner/master is low on hunger value.

$(li)Shearer: requiring a shear being placed in maids' main hand; maids will seek sheeps and shear wools if possible. $(li)Torch (Pathfinder?): requiring torches in maids' inventory; maids will place torches at dark spots. $(li)Breeder: maids will breed animals using approporiate items in their inventory, if available.
